name: FontLab Studio Font File
summary: Learn about .VFB files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: When done editing fonts in FontLab Studio, you can export them to .TTF, .OTF, .PFB, and .PFA formats. Select File â†’ Generate Font... from the application menu.
VFB files can be opened by several FontLab products, including FontLab Studio, Fontographer, TypeTool, AsiaFont Studio, TransType Pro, and others.

description:
A VFB file is a font file created with FontLab Studio. It stores font data such as shapes of letters, numerals, and symbols, in a digital format. The glyphs of these digital fonts make up the alphabet and other symbols. VFB file format stores font in a vector file format. This makes the glyphs independent of scaling without losing quality.

You can open VFB file using FontLab Studio and FontLab TransType Pro.

Font file created by FontLab Studio, a font authoring program; contains a designed font, which includes the glyphs that make up the alphabet and other symbols; stores the font in a vector format so that the glyphs can be scaled without losing quality.

instructions:
You can convert:

VFB to .TTFVFB to .OTFVFB to .PFBVFB to .PFA
